text: beshak jo log hamaaree in raushan daleelon aur hidaayaton ko jinhen hamane naazil kiya usake baad chhipaate hain jabaki ham kitaab taurait mein logon ke saamane saaf saaf bayaan kar chuke hain to yahee log hain jin par khuda bhee laanat karata hai aur laanat karane vaale bhee laanat karate hain
